info.+content: シン・エヴァンゲリオン劇場版:||
ヱヴァンゲリヲン新劇場版：？

Shinji, Asuka and Rei end up in a small village of people who survived the Near Third Impact. Rei learns of a live outside of NERV and Shinji is depressed over the consequenes of his actions.Gendo Ikari still wants to create a Final Impact as the last step in his Human Instrumentality Project and everyone has a role to play. Shinji has to face his father to try stop this.
#2: "Beautiful World (Da Capo Version)" by Hikaru Utada
